info.title: Native - Network Services
info.description:
Cisco IOS-XE Native Configuration - Services

Extracted from Cisco-IOS-XE-native YANG module.
**Category:** Services
**Paths:** 20

**HTTP Methods:**
- GET: Retrieve configuration
- PUT: Replace configuration
- PATCH: Merge/update configuration
- DELETE: Remove configuration

get.description: Modify use of network based services
